returns._0: max period can be used to request twap

params._period: period in second that we want to calculate average on

getTwap(address,address,address,uint32).details: if period is longer than the current timestamp - first timestamp stored in the pool, this will revert with "OLD".

params._base: base currency. to get eth/dai price, eth is base token
params._period: number of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average
params._quote: quote currency. to get eth/dai price, dai is the quote currency

returns._0: price of 1 base currency in quote currency. scaled by 1e18

params._base: base currency. to get eth/dai price, eth is base token
params._period: number of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average
params._quote: quote currency. to get eth/dai price, dai is the quote currency

returns._0: price of 1 base currency in quote currency. scaled by 1e18

getMaxPeriod(address).notice: get the max period that can be used to request twap.

getTimeWeightedAverageTickSafe(address,u.notice: get time weighed average tick, not converted to price

getTwap(address,address,address,uint32).notice: get twap converted with base & quote token decimals

getTwapSafe(address,address,address,uint.notice: get twap converted with base & quote token decimals, never reverts
